programmes.show_description: Say Your Prayers. When teenager LaTonya Taylor gets pregnant, her mum vows to support her no matter what. But someone's hiding resentment that will destroy the whole family. S7, Ep9
About To Break. When newly divorced Wendi Davidson meets charming Brian Chevalier, it seems to be the perfect remedy for heartbreak. But all is not as blissful as it seems. S7, Ep10
Last Night Apart. Adrianne Robert was found dead by her roommate after a night out. Investigators use security footage to hunt for a calculated killer. S7, Ep9
Four And A Half Minutes. A grainy parking lot video is the lone witness to a Tacoma, Washington, father's tragic execution. Police rely on security cameras to find the killer. S7, Ep10
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Deserted Dogs. Investigators decide if the owner of two pit bulls with severe mange should be prosecuted, and rescue an ailing puppy that is starving and dehydrated. S4, Ep8
Remnant of Blame. Investigators must determine the full story of a murder from a tiny scrap of evidence in order to solve a heinous crime. S4, Ep1
Partners in Crime. Investigates partners who commit crimes, including two cab drivers, and a new DNA technique that can extract clues from four-year-old evidence. S4, Ep2
Dangerous Takedown. In 1997 two burglars broke into a home and shot at a police officer. One year later clues to the location of the suspects are revealed. S6, Ep14
Inside The Bureau. When a bank manager was unable to open the bank vault, the FBI was called in, revealing a sophisticated burglary with estimated losses of $8 million. S6, Ep15
Adrian Prout. The former fiancée of wealthy farmer and landowner, Adrian Prout, reveals what it was like living with a man who lied about killing his wife. S3, Ep1
True Crime. Crime writers know as much about crime as any crime-fighter - or criminal. They can provide as near a first-person account of a murder as is possible. S3, Ep14
Coroner's Casebook. A good coroner provides what is necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can ruin an otherwise rock-solid case. S3, Ep15
Remnant of Blame. Investigators must determine the full story of a murder from a tiny scrap of evidence in order to solve a heinous crime. S4, Ep1
A Hole In Time. When single dad David Heisler goes missing, clues lead detectives into the desert, but the trail stops cold. Digital forensics experts to help unravel this mystery. S2, Ep1
The Vest. When widow Valena Shepherd is found dead at home, police suspect foul play. Investigators follow digital clues that suggest Valena knew her killer. S2, Ep7
Searching for Mr. Wrong. When Nikki McPhatter doesn't show up for her usual work shift, her friends immediately worry - and point investigators to her online relationships. S4, Ep8
Partners In Crime. Sam Dreher and his wife are the perfect couple. But when Sam falls in love with another woman, his affair triggers a chain of events that spirals out of control. S5, Ep7
Swipe Right For Murder. When Ashley Pegram goes missing after meeting a man through a dating app, police discover she is caught up in a nightmarish trap set by an online predator. S5, Ep10
People You May Know. Lorianna Parker is excited when she meets handsome Corey Davis online. But when she goes to meet him in the flesh, her dream date turns into a living nightmare. S4, Ep3
She Had No Name. A young woman vanishes into a patrol car. For 35 years, she's a Jane Doe, until hypnosis reveals a clue that unmasks a predator hiding in plain sight. S1, Ep5
Feared Silent. After a call on Friday the 13th, José Herran vanishes. As police dig in, they find a town where fear reigns, pain is ritual, and horror thrives. S1, Ep6
Groomed For Murder. Luke Harlow imprisoned a schoolgirl in his flat before Stephen Beadman raped and murdered her. Experts reveal how they gave away their guilt within moments. S5, Ep2
When's Mom Coming Home? After her divorce Joann Albanese meets a new man. But by the time Joann discovers her boyfriend isn't who he claims to be, it's already too late. S7, Ep11
Tell Me You Love Me. Ashley Pittman thinks she met her perfect match when she marries Jeffrey Scott. But behind the closed doors of her new life, a secret threatens to turn deadly. S7, Ep12
The Three Of Us. A woman vanishes while on a Hawaiian vacation to celebrate her 29th birthday. Police trace her movements to a Waikiki hotel, covered by CCTV cameras. S7, Ep11
The Cookie Lady. An elderly woman is beaten to death in her Texas home. The only clues are a trail of strange credit card transactions - and surveillance video. S7, Ep12

Teleshopping.
Soldier Soldier. Forensic experts uncover the stories behind the deaths of the young men who went to war and never came back. S1, Ep1
Deadly Chemistry. Poisons can be deadly and are often impossible to detect. Forensic experts show how they can solve these mysterious deaths. S1, Ep2
Radical Resistance. The bureau investigates the activities of a Croatian terrorist group who gunned down some of their opponents and eliminated others with parcel bombs. S6, Ep16
Operation Goldenrod. In Beirut armed extremists seize a plane and terrorise everyone on board. The CIA undertakes a daring operation to stop the hijackers; but will they succeed? S6, Ep18
Ian Huntley. The murder of 10-year-olds Holly Wells and Jessica Chapman in 2002 shocked the UK. Experts study media interviews of their killer, Ian Huntley, to expose his lies. S2, Ep1
Caught in the Act. Follows FBI investigations into similar armed robberies across the US in which several people were killed by two male suspects. S5, Ep2
Home Invaders. A convicted bank robber and his partner in crime escape on their way to court and go on to make the biggest bank robbery in Wisconsin history. S5, Ep5
Lawless. When police officers respond to a domestic disturbance, a fleeing suspect fires at them. Fingerprints and an FBI investigation lead to the criminal. S5, Ep7
Operation Howze And Bolton Fraud. Barrister Robert Rinder explores the case of a gang who terrorised the elderly and vulnerable, stealing hundreds of thousands of pounds. S2, Ep1
Laura Davies And Acid Attack. Judge Rinder examines the case of 21-year-old Laura Davies, who was murdered by her partner when she wanted to end their relationship. S1, Ep1
Victor Nealon And Cash Robberies. Judge Rinder examines the wrongful conviction of Victor Nealon, who was found guilty of attempted rape and sentenced to life imprisonment. S1, Ep2
Joanna Yeates. British criminal barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of 25-year-old Joanna Yeates, who was found strangled to death on Christmas Day in 2010. S1, Ep3
320k Con And Zoe Dronfield. Judge Rinder examines the real-life case of Debbie Davey, who fell victim to an elaborate scam orchestrated by a very close friend. S1, Ep4
Adam Vincent And Sophie Lancaster. British criminal barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of Adam Vincent from Grimsby, who was severely menaced by a local family. S1, Ep5
Asher Maslin. Hollie Gazzard is murdered at work by her ex-partner, Asher Maslin. What critical mistake gave police what they needed to bring the killer to justice? S5, Ep8
Black Widow Of Pennsylvania. When Myrle's husband dies under mysterious circumstances, her daughter Rebecca suspects she's a black widow in disguise. S10, Ep12
The Speedboat Killer. After Charlotte Brown died in a speedboat accident, the vessel's owner claimed he was innocent. Experts reveal the full extent of Jack Shepherd's deception. S5, Ep3
